name: HEADACHE (itch) (Gerbil, SinigangShake)
description:
Game made in 48 hours for AngrySmile's Discord Jam.  "Eat" you way to a  complete state of euphoria! 

Hint: Look for the butterfly 

CONTROLS: 

-LeftMouseButton - drag and drop objects
-Space (restart)

Programming : Gerbil
Art: SinigangShake

Music:
Look at Me Produced by Purple Six Beats
Pscychedelic by Benjamin Tissot
